sql.name: buildtogethercircuitindicatorsinputreportpage.group
sql.item: select t.groupname from ( select g.c630000018 groupname from {100} g where g.c630000021='2' and g.c630000020='000000000600001' and g.c630000027='1' union all select trim('网管中心') groupname from dual ) t

sql.name: buildtogethercircuitindicatorsinputreport.group
buildtogethercircuitindicatorsinputreport.left
sql.item: select ' ',trim('合建电路合计-2M(条)') as 指标名称 from dual union all select ' ',trim('合建电路合计-155M(条)') from dual union all select ' ',trim('合建电路合计-2.5G(条)') from dual union all select ' ',trim('合建电路合计-10G(条)') from dual

sql.name: buildtogethercircuitindicatorsinputreport.centervalue
sql.item: select trim('合建电路合计-2M(条)'),t.c802000002 as 部门,sum(t.c802000004) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('合建电路合计-155M(条)'),t.c802000002 as 部门,sum(t.c802000005) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('合建电路合计-2.5G(条)'),t.c802000002 as 部门,sum(t.c802000006) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('合建电路合计-10G(条)'),t.c802000002 as 部门,sum(t.c802000010) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002
